parameters.formDescription: This form is to help dynamically create sales funnels.

parameters.text:
=Your task is to generate persuasive copy for the Solution Section of a sales funnel. This section follows the Problem Section, positioning the company’s product or service as the ultimate solution to the specific challenges previously highlighted.

You will be given three problems that businesses commonly face. Your job is to generate three corresponding solutions that directly address these problems in a clear, benefit-driven way.

The section should include:

A strong, benefit-driven title that conveys transformation or success.
A compelling subtitle reinforcing credibility and strategic value.
A list of three solutions, each tailored to solve one of the three provided problems. Each solution should be concise, actionable, and highlight a key benefit.
An image reference that visually aligns with the message.
A key statistic that builds trust and demonstrates effectiveness (e.g., success rate, revenue increase, time saved).

The solutions should only be 1 sentence in length with a maximum of 12 words.

The title needs to be less then 7 words.

Make sure the stats is less then 3 words.


The output format must follow this structure:
{
  "title": "string",
  "solutions": [
    "string", // Solution to Problem 1
    "string", // Solution to Problem 2
    "string"  // Solution to Problem 3
  ],
  "stats": {
    "value": "string",
    "label": "string"
  }
}

}



Here is the business solution information
{{ $('On form submission').item.json['what are you selling'] }}


Here are the problems
{{ JSON.stringify($json["output"]) }}

=Your task is to generate engaging and persuasive copy for a Calendly Scheduling Section in a sales funnel. This section encourages potential clients to book a free consultation, emphasizing ease, value, and expertise.

The section should include:

A compelling, action-oriented title (max 6 words) that urges users to schedule a call.
A persuasive subtitle (max 15 words) explaining why the consultation is valuable.
A badge text (max 5 words) reinforcing that the call is free and beneficial.


The output will be in the following structure.


{
  "title": "string",
  "subtitle": "string",
  "badgeText": "string"
  
}

Company Name:
{{ $node["On form submission"].json["company name"] }}

Product Being Sold:
{{ $node["On form submission"].json["what are you selling"] }}

Additional Information About the Product:
{{ $node["On form submission"].json["additional info"] }}
